# WKFindConfiguration

**Class**

The configuration parameters to use when searching the contents of the web view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class WKFindConfiguration
```

## Overview

Create a [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKFindConfiguration] object and configure its attributes to specify how to perform searches within the web view’s contents. To initiate a search, call the appropriate method of [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] and pass this object along with the search string.

## Configuring the Search Parameters

- **backwards**: A Boolean value that indicates the search direction, relative to the current selection.
- **caseSensitive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to consider case when matching the search string.
- **wraps**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the search wraps around to the other side of the page.

## Related Documentation

- **find(_:configuration:completionHandler:)**: Searches for the specified string in the web view’s content.

## Page-level search

- **WKFindResult**: An object that contains the results of searching the web view’s contents.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
